snippet: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin did little to hide his displeasure Tuesday after sloppy play and mental mistakes resulted in a tough loss for the Giants against the Redskins.
abstract: New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin is outspoken in his disappointment with his team's performance in their 17-16 loss to Washington Redskins.
lead_paragraph: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin did little to hide his displeasure Tuesday after sloppy play and mental mistakes resulted in a tough loss for the Giants against the Redskins.

headline.seo: Coughlin Fumes About What Giants Did, and Didn’t Do, in Washington
headline.main: Coughlin Fumes About What Giants Did, and Didn’t Do, in Washington
headline.print_headline: Coughlin Fumes About What Giants Did, and Didn’t Do, in Washington
